flawed_nl_solution:
Oliver used 1/3 x 135 = <<1/3*135=405/1>>405/1 stickers.
So, there were 135 - 405/1 = <<135-405/1=-270>>-270 stickers remaining.
His friend received 2/5 x -270 = <<2/5*-270=-108>>-108 stickers.
Therefore, Oliver kept -270 - -108 = <<-270--108=-162>>-162 stickers.
#### -162

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 405/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
